meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Keri McConaghy Jonathan Corbblah Sandra McClellan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6041.

td.p: Keri McConaghy, a social worker from Chelsea, Massachusetts
Jonathan Corbblah, a chess teacher from Harlem, New York
Sandra McClellan, a granny nanny from Arlington, Texas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $4,199)

tr.td: BIBLICAL CROSSWORD CLUES "M"
ACTORS & THEIR ROLES
EDUCATION
DESIGNER NAMES
HMM... PRONOUN TROUBLE

tr.td: Sandra
Jonathan
Keri

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Jonathan: [After Alex gives the correct response] Duh!)
[Laughter]
[ERRATUM: On 2010-12-16 Jeopardy! acknowledged this clue\'s flaw with the following posted to the official Jeopardy! Message Board: "[I]t has since come to our attention that we failed to anticipate another response that would have been acceptable, namely \'What are Mali and Malawi?\' Fortunately our error did not affect the outcome of the game."]
KeriWhat are ?
$7,200
SandraWhat are Guinea & Gu
$6,601
JonathanWhat is Bujumbura
$7,000
Niger/Nigeria')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'In only 2 cases can you add 2 letters to one country & get another country: Austria/Australia & this pair')

tr.td: COUNTRIES
In only 2 cases can you add 2 letters to one country & get another country: Austria/Australia & this pair
Sandra
Jonathan
Keri
2nd place: $2,000
New champion: $13,000
3rd place: $1,000
Sandra
Jonathan
Keri

17 R
(including 1 DD),
6 W

26 R
(including 2 DDs),
4 W

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
